ing: 1 tablespoon Thai peanut sauce, or more to taste
des: "I just started eating raw and am thinking of ways to make my food yummy. I made the Thai Peanut Sauce with Honey from Allrecipes and then used my own salad blend. It is so yummy."
ins: Arrange tomato slices on a plate. Mix pine nuts, almonds, goji berries, peanut sauce, and sesame seeds in a bowl; spoon over tomatoes.
